alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Inland Georgetown (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 2:24PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Georgetown and south central Horry Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 223 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Plantersville, or near Murrells Inlet, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, Surfside Beach, Pawleys Island, Springmaid Pier, Socastee, Garden City, Murrells Inlet, Myrtle Beach Airport, Burgess, Bucksport, Plantersville, Litchfield Beach and Waccamaw Community Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Inland Georgetown
